post.body: I have a nice #PowerShell script for testing SMTP
... don't report something
if it's like the UK - financial workers are obliged by law to report anything suspicious and can be prosecuted if they
hey back!
how much are you looking for for the MX5500 combos?
@chartier RIM.com is the corporate site - try http://blackberry.com for product info and support
I've used Dorgem - development discontinued now but still available for download and useful http://dorgem.sourceforge.net/
here's a site with some more 'useful' phrases http://bit.ly/16DpS - and a not-quite-so-useful one http://bit.ly/7N9h
how are they load balanced? Is it possible to offload SSL?
myself @objektivs and @djmc have committed to #hundredpushups
BlackBerry OS v5.0 features leaked http://bit.ly/fulE
loving the new features in RoyalTS - had to pay for a license to get access to my saved connections though
License plate: XXXX IT
note to self - remember to ditch the UK credit card and get an NZ one to appease the anti-fraud dept at Valve
Steam won't let me buy anything! Any kind soul in NZ (with a Steam account) willing to purchase on my behalf in return for a bank txfr?
Orcon rolling out broadband with "kick-ass" speeds and lower prices across Wellington city later this month http://bit.ly/14F73
If you dream of being woken up by @stephenfry you should get one of these talking alarm clocks http://www.voco.uk.com/
really enjoying the Flight Of The Conchords marathon on The Box - haven't seen the FOTC One Night Stand for ages. Top stuff!
turning my study upside down hunting for a lost PCI 802.11g card. I know it's here somewhere...
anyone need any cables? Going cheap! http://bit.ly/jQq6
